categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Operation Thunderbolt was an operation undertaken by the Sullustan Resistance under Gaff Kilvaari during the Galactic Civil War. The goal of the mission was to disrupt the Imperial aligned–SoroSuub Corporation's operations in G'rinn Go city.
The Operation had four primary targets: an AgriSuub research facility, the G'rinn Go city corporate security HQ, the SoroSuub land systems and proving grounds, and a SoroSuub secure uplink station.
